author: nsoromma8
comment: Extremely user friendly. Seems so simple yet you can actually make quite a few different face looks with it. Your zodiac sign or not you can make a really nice watch face however you want with quite a few choices. Great app, and great developer one of my favorites personally.

author: Mark Cartier
comment: This is the best watch face I've found. Easy to customize, nice and responsive, and I love how you can save your settings. I've spent a good hour tinkering and saving presets so I can switch back and forth between my favorite styles. Excellent work designing this!!

author: Melanie McGlade
comment: Too many display options. Step counter display doesn't work despite keep connecting to Google fit.  Waste of money!!

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Melanie - average score 4.4, thousands of users and you with problems... I can't just believe that you don't get how to operate such an easy watch face. If you need guidance... let me know. If you would like refund, despite bad review I can issue one for you. Thank you. Marcin.

title: Very disappointing

author: Ernesto Crame
comment: Can't complain much. Nicely designed watch face. Menu are easy to click and face is very responsive.
title: Nice Work.

author: Strongman Corporation
comment: Zodiac watch is installed but it not showing up on my watch or android

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Please see the faq for installs problem solutions: http://bit.ly/wearfaq

title: I've followed the instructions and factory reset and the zodiac watch is still not connecting

author: Kim Crawford
comment: Just downloaded this as part of a premium membership. Had to pay for it but it doesn't do anything won't open and can't be found. Instead of open it says refund I. App store

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Kim, please kindly learn how to operate Android Wear. All watch faces even those without launcher icon are accessible from Android Wear app on the phone. Please open mentioned Android Wear application on your phone, click MORE button and all will be clear. Then remove this review, thank you.

author: Massoud Qafouri
comment: I Love this app as it's come with lots of pre-saved face.
title: Nice watch face

author: Javier Calvo
comment: Love the app. Wish you could have a choice for different time zones

author: ptah white
comment: This is a great watchface with great customisation! I had this watch about a week before i found my perfect custom preset, now ive had it over a month. Havnt switched the face yet. There are alot of gimmicky faces out there but in my opinion this one is the best at simplicity and style. Totally worth. Thanks!
title: Best Watchface

author: Tim Flynn
comment: Absolutely awesome watch face, I have tried many over the last few months and this is my favourite by far.  It clearly shows me the important info I want to see without cluttering up the display.  The only thing missing is the ability to configure the screen-on time, I miss this from my last watch face!  5 stars when this gets implemented.  Edit: Thanks so much for adding this!

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Tim :-) I am grateful for sharing your expriences! Great!

author: John Hoit
comment: I can't use this. It sucks way too much battery. I can't get a full day out of a watch that's supposed to last for 2 (in ideal conditions of course). I like the look and function but I'm sorry I lost money on it.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Dear John. Zodiac has huge amount of settings and it is entirely up to you what battery consumption it has. If you need help to understand android watch details - join our communities or just mail me. I will gladly help you in your Android Wear adventure. EDIT3: That's a pity you ignored my tries for help you requested... EDIT4: John ???

title: Needs help

author: Nathan Heishman
comment: This app lets you do it all. It has presets for those who may not know there way around an app as well as customization for those who want to change things up. It allow you to connect google fit which is a plus! Weather can be set in Celsius and Fahrenheit. Another plus! You can change colors, watch arms and tons of other stuff. Love it! I have a moto360.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you very much Nathan for such amazing review! :-)

title: Great addition to a wonderful accessory

author: Nathan Cunningham
comment: Asus Zenwatch2/Galaxy S3: This is one of the first watch face makers I've bought for my Android Wear device and so far everything went smooth and the watch face I created looks great. Many many options for tweaking setup, letters, numbers, info and background colors. I want to see what kind of battery life I get out of this app since typically I use the stock Asus watch faces. Hopefully its about the same or Ill have to drop a star or 2 depending on its battery consumption.
title: Great Watch Faces

author: mike c
comment: Like it a lot so far. Moto 360 keeps track of steps on its own. Wish this face would recognize that. Haven't used the face in months because of that.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Hello Mike, it is connected to Google FIT because other sources do not  allow for data query. The Google FIT is the only unified and widely supported source. I decided avoid own calculating and eventually wait for API from Motorola. Till then... Google FIT :-)

title: Pretty good. Needs tweaking.

author: Tony Tramel
comment: Great watch face 5 star all the way ... would love to see you come out with more watch Faces :-)
title: Another Awesome watch face

author: Arijit Sarkar
comment: I like this face,  looks good. Works fine on my Huawei. However, presets still lack variety.
title: Good but not there yet

author: Pubudu Tippalagama
comment: i really enjoy the level of customization, it's easy to configure  my favorite involves with amber, red, yellow highlights on a plain black background.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Pubudu for great review! :-)

author: Loren Stuck
comment: I love this one! Looks nice and one of the only ones with interactive music controls! Developer definitely cares and is responsive. Would like to see a preview type setup so I don't have to constantly look at my watch to see how the change looks. Still 5 stars though!

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Loren, thank you! Contros under control, update is being prepared. Thank you!

title: Awesome watch face!

author: Jakob Daxböck
comment: not a bad watch but functionally inferior to "minimal and elegant". i prefer the analog watch but i really like the "interactive functions" buttons implemented in m&e to control google music. EDIT: thank you for the update, this is now my main watchface :)

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Jakob - last update added all features as suggested :-)

author: David Crump
comment: Excellent watch face. one thing that might be missing is a ring button I can tap to start the microphone, so I can begin a Google voice search.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank David - I'll work on that :-)

author: Brad Hoff
comment: Works great!

author: Mike Wu
comment: Great combination of analog and digital. Easy to customize and looks amazing. Works perfectly on my Huawei Watch!

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Huawei fully supported after last update :-)

title: Customizable and beautiful

comment: I've never done an app review after years of Android usage but this app really deserves it.  This is a real live honest review.  I just loaded this after dozens of watch faces and I'm done.  This face has everything I could ever want, outstanding job on this code, I LOVE IT!!!! Soooo many great options and now my smartwatch is actually functional from one screen and looks great.  The battery gauges for both phone and watch is brilliant thinking!  Two thumbs up here, thanks!!!

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Eric :-)

title: Best watch face value yet

author: Dawn Grimm
comment: Simply put Studio Extreme has developed three of the best watch faces in the App Store. I haven't touched any other watch faces since I discovered these. Highly customizable yet they remain minimal, simplistic, and gorgeous. Do yourself a favor and check out these watch faces. I guarantee you won't be disappointed.
title: The BEST of the BEST!!

author: darrell bublitz
comment: I really do want to love this watch. I agree the few criticisms so far, but one very big one seem to be omitted... Interactive buttons on the face. For be it would be perfect if I could get rid of the hands and be digital only, of I could tap the weather button and get the 5 day forecast, and tap the date button and get calendar open. Still looking for that even from others. Can't find the perfect one yet.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Darrell - done! Latest update adds requested features and far more :-)

title: I want to love it....

author: David Johnson
comment: Not only does this watch face display the date, day of the week, battery of both phone and watch, weather, but it also looks REALLY COOL! And it is super customizable. I love this watchface.
title: It displays all the info I want and looks GREAT!

author: Yudis Murti
comment: You don't need any other watch face when you can customize it. This watch face gives you all of the customization, which is absurdly awesome. I bought it and I don't think I need more watch face, except maybe for the flip clock.
title: Just awesome

author: Patrick Vuillermin
comment: If Minimal and Elegant is the digital watch face to beat, this is the analogue. If you only buy two watch faces ever, make it these two. Endless customisation options mean you can dress up your watch to match anything you're wearing and its almost impossible to find a bad combo (I use it on both my black and silver 360's). All information you could want is available to display and the face is as flashy or as minimal as you like. Easy enough on battery too. GEDDIT!
title: Yet again. Wears' best.

author: David Mowry
comment: Really like it, updated rating because of the addition of notification number and step counter. Would like to see the ability to change the background image to something custom. Highly recommended watch face.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you David, as in my other watchfaces - updates are done on regular basis. So more and more functionalities are becoming available :-)

title: Like it, just missing something.

author: David Broom
comment: ALMOST perfect - Would like digital time ONLY in top area, digital date ONLY in bottom area. Would like same digital date formatting facility as in Minimal and Elegant watch face. Would like ability to disable/hide inner and outer decorations. Otherwise PERFECT - Battery drain is amazingly low with minimal options set.

author: Ran Arad
comment: This watch face is fully customizable, from elements, to colors, to the information presented,  when and where. The only thing I could ask for is more background symbols, not just zodiac signs, e.g. spiral, star, heart, etc.
title: Everything I could have wanted

author: Jonathon E
comment: Just got note 5 and apparently this watch face isn't updated for 5.1.1.. worked great on note 3.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Hello. It works with all latest versions. I suppose you would need to reinstall it. My FAQ may be very helpful: http://academyextreme.com/faq/ . Thanks for check and re-rate. :-)

title: Love it except...

author: Francis Yusuke
comment: Nice simple watch like it on my lg urbane anyway I wish there is a tweak to set how long does it goes to ambient mode it seems to fast for me. Other than that I like the face
title: Nice

author: geri remy
comment: I love that I can make this watch face the way I want it.  I would be great to be able to use a picture for the background but that doesn't take away from me liking this watchface

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Geri. I think I would need to add custom background for this watch face :-) Maybe in one of next updates. Thanks!

title: Very customizable

author: Jed Marsillo
comment: I love this watch face. This is the last watch face you will ever need. Tons of customization. The possibilities are endless. I highly recommend this app. I use it on both my moto360 and my Asus zenwatch. Looks and works great on both.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Jed - Thank you!

title: Amazing watch face.

author: Jesse Bertrand
comment: Great watch face. The only thing that is missing for me is the ability to modify screen-on time

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Jesse - I will try to port the solution from Minimal & Elegant to Zodiac too. Thank you for great opinion!

author: Jason Jones
comment: And just like that, Marcin comes through and makes this face perfect. Wonderful app, even better developer.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Done :-) Latest updates adds interactive functions and fonts :-)

title: Perfect

author: Donald Graham
comment: No chance of a refund if it you don't like it, go for "pujie black" alot more polished

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Donald your review is misleading. Google guarantees refund addionally in case of user request I do always refund manually even few weeks after purchase if user wants to. Users' review and staisfaction is my highest priority. Please contact and change this review.

title: No chance of a refund??

author: Jamal Fladger
comment: Now that's it's working and I can really use it I love it and all it offers its very very customizable

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Jamal :-)

title: Really?

author: Ja Kub
comment: Great watch face, lots of customization options, community with presets, quick support
title: Moto G + Moto 360
